Package dr.evolution.coalescent

Interface Summary
DemographicFunction This interface provides methods that describe a demographic function.
IntervalList An interface for a set of coalescent intevals.
 

Class Summary
CataclysmicDemographic This class models an exponentially growing (or shrinking) population (Parameters: N0=present-day population size; r=growth rate).
Coalescent A likelihood function for the coalescent.
CoalescentSimulator This class provides the basic engine for coalescent simulation of a given demographic model over a given time period.
ConstantPopulation This class models coalescent intervals for a constant population (parameter: N0=present-day population size).
ConstExpConst This class models exponential growth from an initial population size which then transitions back to a constant population size.
ConstExponential This class models exponential growth from an initial population size.
ConstLogistic This class models logistic growth from an initial population size.
DemographicFunction.Abstract  
DemographicFunction.Utils  
EmpiricalPiecewiseConstant  
Expansion This class models exponential growth from an initial ancestral population size.
ExpConstExpDemographic This class models a two-stage exponential growth with a constant plateau separating them.
ExponentialBSPGrowth This class models an exponentially growing (or shrinking) population (Parameters: N0=present-day population size; r=growth rate).
ExponentialGrowth This class models an exponentially growing (or shrinking) population (Parameters: N0=present-day population size; r=growth rate).
ExponentialLogistic Exponential growth followed by Logistic growth.
ExponentialSawtooth This class models a sawtooth demographic in which exponential growth is punctuated by frequent periodic crashes.
IntervalList.Utils  
Intervals A concrete class for a set of coalescent intevals.
LogisticGrowth This class models logistic growth.
PiecewiseConstantPopulation  
PiecewiseExponentialPopulation  
PiecewiseLinearPopulation  
PLCoalescentSimulator  
ScaledDemographic Scale a demographic by a fixed factor.
Skyline Skyline plot derived from a strictly bifurcating tree or a coalescent interval.
TreeIntervals Extracts the intervals from a tree.
TwoEpochDemographic This class models a demographic function that contains two epochs.
 

Enum Summary
IntervalType Specifies the interval types.
